titleStmt.title: By the Supreame Councell of the Confederate Catholicks of Ireland forasmuch as after a long and serious debate, a cessation of armes and all acts of hostilities, to beginne at twelve of the clocke the fifteenth day of September ...
titleStmt.author: Confederate Catholics. Supreme Council.

notesStmt.note: Other title information from first lines of text.
